headline.print_headline: Some Polygamous Families Face Eviction Over Fees
headline.main: Some Polygamous Families Face Eviction Over Fees

lead_paragraph: Fourteen families who live in a community once controlled by polygamous sect leader Warren Jeffs could be evicted from their homes on the Utah-Arizona border in the coming weeks if they don't begin paying a $100-a-month fee to authorities appointed to oversee their property.
